summary: My first player character saved for Familiar Faces
descriptionHtml:
I've updated the file for FF 1.1.3 - Her game is also now finished, so she is the dragonborn and everything else, she is also now a vampire and is wearing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49939]Lustmord Vampire Armour[/url], unless you don't have that installed in which case she will be nude likely.

Warning : will likely be nude without whatever mod I have my characters wearing. these are my characters I still play with, and I use cool armors from nexus modders which is why I share them, because I don't have the patience to get heavely into modding, so I do this to give back.Furthermore: I don't know if body type or textures make any difference if you have them installed or not so I will just list what I used to create them. My game isn't heavily modded, mostly I like armors and followers.
- I use xp32 maximum extended skeleton
- Unp BBP body
-Apachii skyhair
-sg textures and eyebrows

INSTALL MANUALLY - readme is in the folder, it's very simple

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Old Version-
-Red Head Freckled Blue Eyed Level 57 Nord
-an epic archer
-two handed and block and sneak
-was never much for the magic
-Werewolf/Stormcloak/ hasn't yet went after Alduin
-despises Thalmor
-likes to sit by the tree in whiterun and stare at the stars
-enjoys sneaking through dungeons, loves it when she's killed   someone who didn't even know she was there.
-Her best friend in Skyrim during her game are Sofia and Sighne
-She uses Sword of Tongues and Great Sword of Tongues, the only  mod weapons in her inventory.
-Apachii Sky Hair
-Dragonbone Barbarian Armor ( which gives her a fuller figure as I  opted for UNP Skinny for my game install because I prefer little  bewbz, but I like her in this armor )
-Ultimate Assortment, she likes to wear earings
-She's also a fan of Fecklemania, and no more blocky faces
- I dunno if it matters or not but I use XP32 maximum skeleton
- obviously Familiar Faces is required at the time I uploaded this I was using Familiar Faces 1.0.5.  

So, besides the hair and freckles she's pretty much vanilla made, very first time/try character I've spent most my time playing as. Familiar Faces is great to allow me to be able to share her so easily as I am a little lazy atm for creation kit. I was pleasantly surprised to see as a follower she tends to stay out of your way unlike most followers, and will use her bow from strategic places as in screenshots.


Recommended Mods :
Dragonbone Barbarian Armor ( I imagine she's be unclothed without this installed )
Frecklemania
Sword of the Ancient Tongues
Apachii Sky Hair
No More Blocky Faces
XP32 Maximum Skeleton
Dimonized UNP Skinny Body
author: Batmandoza
